author: ydshieh
message:
Make tests run in less time by reducing `batch_size` (#42213)

* fix

* fix

* 1

* 2

* 2

* 2

* 2

* 2

* 2

* 2

* 2

* 2

* so many batch_size=13 --> batch_size=2

---------

Co-authored-by: ydshieh <ydshieh@users.noreply.github.com>

files.patch:

         self,
         parent,
-        batch_size=13,
+        batch_size=2,
         seq_length=7,

         use_input_mask=True,
